eewa nam, ilmaha karthika mangalyayata pera dawase handawe, duruthumahe aluth sahal mangalyayata pera dawase handawe, bakmahe awurudu mangalyayata kalin dawase handawe, kumbaal perahara widi bahinnata pera dawase, asala maha perahara mangalyaya aarambha kirimata pera dawase, dewele perahara withi sancharaya kirimata pera dawase handawe, maha perahara awasan dina rathriye, diyakapana dinaye dahawal saha sawas waruwe, diggeyi thewawa saha digge narthanaya sidu kara thibe.

siya thuwalayada kisidu aaharayak nomathiwa wahalak matha randi sitinnata sidu wu dirgha gimhana dinayada karana kota gena durwalawa siti ohu siya miyagiya sathurage sindi bindi giya sirurehi darshanayen balawath pilikulata pathwiya.

eheth aluth aanduwa kele, ethek ema paudgalika bankuwalata kalin aanduwen path kota siti ayawalun iwath kota thamange niyojithayan ema thanathuruwalata path kirimayi.me nisa danwath, 2010 n pasu ‘sewaka arthasadhaka aramudale’ aayojanayan pilibandawa parikshana pawathwana atharema, paudgalika mulya anshayen ‘sewaka arthasadhaka aramudala’ waha iwath wiya yuthuwa thibe.2016 nowambar 07 wani da ‘ndeli ef.ti.’ puwathpathe palawu kop warthawe nirdesha paridi ‘sewaka arthasadhaka aramudala’ pilibanda waha parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthuya namathi lipiye sinhala pariwarthanaya (awasana kotasa) ‘yahapalanaya lanka’ anugrahayeni
